ModMetaData.name: All The Permits
ModMetaData.author: Seanbeag
ModMetaData.description:
6 new ranks and 37 new permits to make it a lot more worthwhile and appealing to side with the Empire and work your way up the ranks.
This is not compatible with the new Vanilla Extended Empire mod. If you want a more in-depth Empire experience, I suggest you give that a go. This mod only changes the permits and titles
Bug Fix - v1.4.2 -
Fixed Wood drop not working Fixed incompatability mismatch
Bug Fixes and additions v1.4.1 - Steel drop title requirement fixed 7 New permits added for trade goods Extra permit points added to lower titles to accomodate new permits.
